name: AudioMuse-AI Instant Mix
author: AudioMuse
description: Replaces the Instant Mix button with AudioMuse-AI recommendations for similar tracks

apiUrl.title: AudioMuse-AI API URL
apiUrl.description: Base URL for the AudioMuse-AI server (e.g., http://192.168.3.203:8000).

trackCount.title: Number of Similar Tracks
trackCount.description: Maximum number of similar tracks to return. Default: 200

artistSimilarCount.title: Number of Similar Artists
artistSimilarCount.description: Maximum number of similar artists to request from AudioMuse-AI. Default: 10

eliminateDuplicates.title: Eliminate Duplicates
eliminateDuplicates.description: Remove duplicate tracks from results. Default: true

radiusSimilarity.title: Use Radius Similarity
radiusSimilarity.description: Use radius-based similarity algorithm. Default: true

config.reason: To read plugin configuration in Navidrome UI

http.reason: To call AudioMuse-AI API for similar tracks
